title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 359.4 - Effect of disability on eligibility for benefits to be provided by employer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 359.4 - Effect of disability on eligibility for benefits to be provided by employer

State Regulations

An employee who becomes disabled while he is eligible for
benefits to be provided by a covered employer shall not have his employment
terminated, for purposes of determining his right to disability benefits, during any period in which he would otherwise continue to be eligible for the
benefits to be provided by his employer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
359.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
